id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [MCP47A1 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp47a1.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the DAC. Defaults to `0x2E`.

*See also: [MCP47A1 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp47a1.html#configuration-variables)*
